data:
Here is the table of possible risks and their classification:

| Risk | Classification | Mitigation Plan |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Negative public opinion on the use of AI | High | Conduct thorough market research to understand public perception of AI-based training platforms. Develop a comprehensive communication strategy to address concerns and promote the benefits of PREVENT-IA. |
| Energy consumption | Medium | Optimize the platform's architecture to reduce energy consumption. Implement energy-efficient features and monitor energy usage. |
| Dependence on AI model providers | High | Develop a diversified AI model provider strategy to minimize dependence on a single provider. Establish relationships with multiple providers to ensure continuity of service. |
| Unfriendly interfaces | Medium | Conduct user testing to identify and address usability issues. Implement a user-centered design approach to create intuitive and user-friendly interfaces. |
| Lack of feedback | Medium | Implement a feedback mechanism to collect user feedback and suggestions. Use this feedback to improve the platform and enhance the user experience. |
| Poor prioritization of functionalities | Medium | Conduct a thorough analysis of the platform's functionalities and prioritize them based on user needs and business goals. |
| Low visibility on social media | Low | Develop a social media strategy to increase visibility and promote the platform. Utilize relevant hashtags and engage with target audiences. |
| Difficulty in measuring training quality | Medium | Develop a comprehensive evaluation framework to measure the effectiveness of the training. Use metrics such as completion rates, quiz scores, and feedback to assess the quality of the training. |
| AI use regulations | High | Stay up-to-date with the latest regulations and guidelines on AI use. Ensure compliance with relevant regulations and guidelines. |
|  |  |  |

Note: The classification of risks is subjective and may vary depending on the specific context and environment in which the platform is used.
